message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper discusses codes for fault tolerance in distributed data storage systems, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses connections between different code families, which suggests that it may also belong to the categories of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), cryptography and security (cs.CR), distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC), and coding theory (cs.CC).
